Frequency¶

Defines the frequencies with which a cron job can run

bambu_cron.frequency.DAY = 1440¶

Run a job every 24 hours

bambu_cron.frequency.HOUR = 60¶

Run a job every 60 minutes

bambu_cron.frequency.MINUTE = 1¶

Run a job every 60 seconds

bambu_cron.frequency.MONTH = -1¶

Run a job every month (largely untested)

bambu_cron.frequency.WEEK = 10080¶

Run a job every 7 days

bambu_cron.frequency.YEAR = 525600¶

Run a job every 365 days

Weekdays¶

Defines days of the week as numbers

bambu_cron.weekdays.FRIDAY = 4¶

Friday

bambu_cron.weekdays.MONDAY = 0¶

Monday

bambu_cron.weekdays.SATURDAY = 5¶

Saturday

bambu_cron.weekdays.SUNDAY = 6¶

Sunday

bambu_cron.weekdays.THURSDAY = 3¶

Thursday

bambu_cron.weekdays.TUESDAY = 1¶

Tuesday

bambu_cron.weekdays.WEDNESDAY = 2¶

Wednesday
